enabled.title: Enable Play Midnight
enabled.description: This will temporarily disable/enable Play Midnight if you don't want it on all the time

accentsOnly.title: Enable Light-Mode Accents
accentsOnly.description: This enables custom accents when Play Midnight is disabled

accents.title: Accent Colors
accents.description: Customize the accent color to your heart"s content
accents.note: Currently accepts colors in hex/rgb format (#XXX, #XXXXXX, rgb(X,X,X))

favicon.title: Show Play Midnight Favicon
favicon.description: This is the icon that shows on your Google Play tab in the browser

fab.title: Show Play Midnight Fab Icon
fab.description: Enable the Fab icon for quick access to Play Midnight settings

recent.title: Enable Recent Activity
recent.description: This enables the 'Recent Activity' menu item

queue.title: Enable Larger Queue
queue.description: Makes the now playing queue span across your screen further to prevent cutting off song titles

sidebar.title: Static Sidebar
sidebar.description: Show sidebar on page load and keep it open permanently

topbar.title: Dark Top Bar
topbar.description: Makes the top search bar dark instead of accent color

radio.title: Remove Radio Stations (EXPERIMENTAL)
radio.description: This hides those pesky suggest radio stations (needs more work, some boxes may be bigger than others)

songza.title: Remove Songza
songza.description: This hides the Songza (Play music for..) on the 'Listen Now' page

notify.title: Update Notifications
notify.description: Show Play Midnight update notifications when new features are introduced

verbose.title: Play Midnight VERBOSE Mode
verbose.description: Enables verbose mode, logging all the fun developer notes to the console to see what Play Midnight is up to

thanks.description:
Why hello! Just wanted to take another minute to thank all of you for checking out Play Midnight. This project has been something that has grown with me over time and I can't begin to express how much I've enjoyed hearing from all of you. There have been and will be bugs, and I appreciate that you guys have been kind enough not to tear me apart while I fix them, haha. I've poured as much of myself into this as I can and I hope that you enjoy it as much as I do.

Again, if you notice any issues, or have any suggestions don't hesitate to shoot that over to me. The best place to reach me is through the subreddit at /r/PlayMidnight or through email. If you'd like to shoot me a donation or buy me some coffee, you can do so here. Once again, thanks again for all the feedback and I hope you enjoy Play Midnight, peace!
